name: SpeedBall (itch)
description:
Warning: This Is A Prototype/Early Access Game. Some Stuff May Change In The Final Version.

This Is For A Game Jam Called "I Cant Draw".
I Will List The Controls Here:
A and D = Move Left Or Right
Shift and A or D = Dash
Space = Jump
Lava Jump = Jump Into The Lava Then Press Space While Moving.
Why Lava Jump?
If Your On A Difficult Situation You Can Save Yourself By Jumping Onto The Lava And Then Blast Off.

Forgot Something.
Up And Down Arrows To Navigate Through The Main Menu.
Enter To Confirm
